DOC.brief_summary: This study assess pharmacokinetic interaction ASP1941 Miglitol healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Drug-Drug Interaction Between ASP1941 Miglitol
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , open-label , 3-way crossover design study ass drug-drug interaction single oral dose ASP1941 single oral dose Miglitol healthy adult male volunteer . Each subject receive `` ASP1941 alone '' , `` Miglitol alone '' `` ASP1941 + Miglitol '' .
DOC.criteria: Healthy judge investigator/subinvestigator base result physical examination laboratory test Body weight ; ≥50.0 kg , < 80.0 kg Body Mass Index ; ≥17.6 , < 26.4 Written inform consent obtain Received investigational drug within 120 day screen assessment Donated 400 mL whole blood within 90 day , 200 mL whole blood within 30 day , blood component within 14 day screen assessment Received medication within 7 day hospital admission A deviation assessment criterion physical examination laboratory test screen upon admission History drug allergy With renal , hepatic , gastrointestinal , heart , cerebrovascular respiratory diseases Previous treatment ASP1941
